title: The Riot At Bucksnort And Other Western Tales
description: An entertaining selection of Western tales, many of which were originally published between 1934 and 1937, features such inimitable characters as Breckinridge Elkins, Pike Bearfield, and Buckner J. Grimes, as they make their bumbling way through the colorful landscape of the American West. Simultaneous.
author: Robert E. Howard
